Package dev.gamekit.graphics

Class DrawShape

java.lang.Object
dev.gamekit.graphics.DrawCall
dev.gamekit.graphics.DrawShape
Direct Known Subclasses:
DrawLine, DrawOval, DrawRoundRect
public abstract class DrawShape extends DrawCall
DrawShape is an abstract draw call to render a shape to the window
